Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to Account 3. Open account switcher 4. Select User A account 5. Open account switcher 6. Select User B account to change it back to the original account 7. Go to Security > Add copilot 8. Enter magic code 9. Select any user 10. Select any access level 11. Click Add copilot ## Expected Result: On magic code page, user email should be included in. ## Actual Result: In step 7, user email is missing after "Please enter the magic code sent to " In step 11, on magic code page, user email is missing in "Please enter the magic code sent to to add a copilot" message ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cae8a7a3-de70-48c2-b6cc-5cbb38afe146 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

title: [CMB] [$250] Block submission and approval in New Expensify if DEW is enabled on the workspace

labels.name: Reviewing
labels.description: Has a PR in review

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Weekly
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: NewFeature
labels.description: Something to build that is a new item.

body:
[Slack Thread 🧵](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C07NMDKEFMH/p1761237774731669?thread_ts=1761159769.356729&cid=C07NMDKEFMH) ## Problem DEW isn't fully supported in NewDot, meaning that if a user manually submits or approve from NewDot in a workspace with DEW enabled, the report is routed incorrectly. ## Solution If a user tries manually submitting or approving a report from NewDot on a workspace with approvalMode = `DYNAMIC_EXTERNAL`, block that action and show a warning modal directing the user back to Expensify Classic. We store `approvalMode` in the policy object. Here's what the modal would look like: The modal text should read: **Title** = Custom approval workflow **Body** = Your company has a custom approval workflow on this workspace, please take this action in Expensify Classic **Button text** = Switch to Expensify Classic

If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.37-1 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** No **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/73096 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** jsdonisjodisdos@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Mac 15.5 / Chrome **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Precondition: - Account has a default workspace which does not have per diem feature (disabled). - Create a second workspace with per diem rates. 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to the second workspace chat. 3. Create a per diem expense in workspace chat. 4. Open the expense report. 5. Click Report field 6. Click Remove from report. 7. Delete the second workspace which has per diem rates. 8. Go to self DM. 9. Open the unreported per diem expense. 10. Click Create report. ## Expected Result: Create report button should not appear because the workspace with per diem rates is deleted. ## Actual Result: Create report button is present and no longer responsive. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/fa961e74-0c36-448c-ad1f-895ff7e77882 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
